title: TNF Preview & Best Slot Receivers
itunes:title: TNF Preview & Best Slot Receivers
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – break down the Monday Night Football game, which saw Carson Wentz go into Chicago and take down the Bears. Then, the heroes weigh in on the latest NFL news, including Adrian Peterson suffering a torn meniscus and DeMarcus Ware undergoing surgery for a broken arm. Finally, the gang previews the Thursday Night Football game which features Brock Osweiler and Texans heading to Foxborough to take on Jacoby Brissett and the Patriots. Plus, find out who are the top ten slot receivers in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
